Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado. Los niveles tienen un nivel de diseño fascinante; los acertijos son divertidos y equilibrados: la complejidad no es abrumadora pero tienen su reto. El guión maneja un humor bastante bueno y la creatividad en general destaca demasiado en este título. Todo estos aspectos están orquestados, de manera magistral, por la simplicidad y el genio de sus desarrolladores.
Novel game play unlike any other game (including Portal 1), though provoking puzzles
Science isn't about WHY, it's about WHY NOT!!

this is one of my favorite steam games, it doesnt offer much gameplay time on the story mode but you can play community chambers or even make your own and i just dont want to stop playing this game. its really fun, would recommend.

Probablemente mi juego favorito. Mejora todos los aspectos del Portal original, y los amplía sumándole una pequeña historia llena de ese humor tan característico de Valve. Muy disfrutable, incluso si ya te lo pasaste 5 veces como yo. El modo cooperativo es maravilloso, y el editor de niveles es bastante sólido y fácil de usar.
A Great game for a good price, plenty of levels on the STEAM workshop and never-ending playability. Greatly Recommended.
Fun co-op game to play with friends :)

Teil 1 wie Teil 2 musst du einfach als Gamer gespielt haben. Die Dialoge sind witzig, die Mechanik super und das Spiel im gesamten Rund. Die Story hat im zweiten Teil an einigen Stellen unnötige Längen (Untergrund), aber alles in allem ein super wichtiges Spiel!

крутая игра, покупка стоит того, сюжет 7/10 немного запутанный, и растянутый. Графика 8/10 как для того, так и для этого времени графика очень хороша, и не требует мощного железа. Мултиплеер 9.5/10 очень круто, можно поиграть с другом/рандомом, есть воис чат, и отдельный сюжет для мультиплеера. Игра хорошая, советую купить и поиграть

Portal 2 takes the original and turns it on its head, making it a high production value game that even after 10 years still holds up to modern titles!
Portal 2 delivered a far longer and more dynamic story then portal 1, with twists and turns, location changes, lore and backstory, character development and growth, action sequences, and much more.

However, in doing so, it loses a lot of the original identity of the original game. In portal 1, the enrichment centre was a lonely, dead place with a rogue AI at it's core. In Portal 2, the enrichment centre feels lived in, with characters like Wheatly. Throughout the levels, the disembodied voice shifts, first from being a pre-recorded announcer, then to GLaDOS, then to Cave Johnson, then to Wheatly. Even the co-op mode, which although entertaining, still comes at the cost of what was the core of the original game: the feeling of isolation.

Despite this, the game is still incredible, with a wide range of content to offer. The campaign is brilliant, as is the co-op campaign. Community made levels keep the game fresh and interesting even after hundreds of hours, not to mention the community created campaigns like Portal Stories: Mel.

If you haven't played Portal 2 (for some strange reason), get it, play it, enjoy it. Simple.

Una historia entretenida con toques de humor y una comunidad que dedica tiempo y esfuerzo a mantener vivo el juego  añadiendo más y más contenido, junto con un multijugador igual de ilimitado que lleva la mecánica de los portales un paso mas lejos. Completamente recomendado.

I remember playing this game on my friends pc back when i was younger, it was so fun, enjoyful and a masterpiece back then, replaying it now, it still is. Shit brings some great memories. Can we get a 3rd one?
单人和双人合作都是很好玩很有趣的。单人剧情有转折，关卡设计刚好合适。双人难度难度也满足要求，有简单又复杂，双人一起玩耍很有趣。
L'histoire est hilarante et les enigmes sont assez faciles.
